#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <map>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        char a[100000];
        map<char,int> c;
        int count=0;
        cin.ignore();
        cin>>a;
        int n= strlen(a);
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            c[a[i]]++;
        }
        map<char,int>::iterator it = c.begin(),end = c.end();
        for(it = c.begin();it!=end;++it)
        {
            while(it->second>0)
            {
                if(it->second%2==0)
                {
                    count++;
                    (it->second) =(it->second)-2;
                }
                else
                {
                    count++;
                    it->second= (it->second)-1;
                }
            }
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
}
